attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spillers records is one of the oldest record shops, if not the oldest record shop in the world. Founded in 1894 it has a unique cultural standing and is of great historical value. The landowners are proposing a substantial rent increase to allow a number of high street chains to takeover the location and create yet another generic high street.
 
Music plays a substantial weight in the cultural make up of the UK and a huge contribution to its balance of payments. A record shop is an important and vital part of the music chain.

Support Spillers!
